It also contains TWO versions of the best GB series emulator, Visual Boy Advance:
Visual Boy Advance 1.8.0 beta3
***Visual Boy Advance 1.8.0 Link Version
The link version enables up to 4 players to link each other via LAN or in the same PC. It also enables two players to link each other via WIRELESS connection, requiring NO PREVIOUS CONFIGURATION.

All these files are packed in a single ".RAR" archive.
The ROMs were all tested by me under Windows XP, and worked perfectly.
Don&#039;t forget to read the "READ ME.txt" file, inside the .RAR archive. It might spare you some time searching the web and asking.
